issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Add join support to query planner
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10586](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10586). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add join support to query planner to translate logical plan to physical plan.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10586?focusedCommentId=17237121) by Jorge Leitão (jorgecarleitao):*
Done together with ARROW-10585
